title: His-Story: We were there too. LGBTQ themes in Cambridge Assessment’s Curriculum
description:
Joni Cambridge Assessment to explore how learners across the world have embraced LGBTQ topics as part of their education. This interactive workshop will use real life examples of students’ work and give attendees the opportunity to further discuss the themes. Refreshments provided.

**Secure exam materials are held on-site, so booking via http://bit.ly/2z5DknI is ESSENTIAL**
